methods.name: getCategory
methods.comment:
Returns the category for this issue.  Categories may use '.' as separators to present 
 a hierarchical category structure.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a detailed description of the issue.
@return a detailed description of the issue.
methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Returns a detailed description of the issue.

return.comment: a detailed description of the issue.

methods.name: getPrimaryLocation
methods.comment: Returns a Location object that describes where the issue occurred.

return.comment:
a Location object that describes where the issue occurred. May return null
 if the issue is not related to a specific location.

methods.name: getSecondaryLocations
methods.comment: Returns a list of locations related to the issue that are not the primary issue location.

return.comment:
a list of locations related to the issue that are not the primary issue location.  
 This list may be empty, but not null.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a list of possible Fixup objects for this issue.
@return a list of possible Fixup objects for this issue. This list may be empty, but not null.
methods.name: getPossibleFixups
methods.comment: Returns a list of possible Fixup objects for this issue.

return.comment: a list of possible Fixup objects for this issue. This list may be empty, but not null.
